description: An OpenSearch Ingestion Service Data Prepper pipeline running Data Prepper.

PersistentBufferEnabled.description: Whether persistent buffering should be enabled.

EncryptionAtRestOptions.description: Key-value pairs to configure encryption at rest.

KmsKeyArn.description: The KMS key to use for encrypting data. By default an AWS owned key is used

LogPublishingOptions.description: Key-value pairs to configure log publishing.

CloudWatchLogDestination.description: The destination for OpenSearch Ingestion Service logs sent to Amazon CloudWatch.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

VpcOptions.description: Container for the values required to configure VPC access for the pipeline. If you don't specify these values, OpenSearch Ingestion Service creates the pipeline with a public endpoint.

SecurityGroupIds.description: A list of security groups associated with the VPC endpoint.

SubnetIds.description: A list of subnet IDs associated with the VPC endpoint.

VpcEndpointManagement.description: Defines whether you or Amazon OpenSearch Ingestion service create and manage the VPC endpoint configured for the pipeline.

VpcAttachmentOptions.description: Options for attaching a VPC to the pipeline.

AttachToVpc.description: Whether the pipeline should be attached to the provided VPC

CidrBlock.description: The CIDR block to be reserved for OpenSearch Ingestion to create elastic network interfaces (ENIs).

VpcEndpoint.description: An OpenSearch Ingestion Service-managed VPC endpoint that will access one or more pipelines.

VpcEndpointId.description: The unique identifier of the endpoint.

VpcId.description: The ID for your VPC. AWS Privatelink generates this value when you create a VPC.

MaxUnits.description: The maximum pipeline capacity, in Ingestion OpenSearch Compute Units (OCUs).

MinUnits.description: The minimum pipeline capacity, in Ingestion OpenSearch Compute Units (OCUs).

PipelineName.description: Name of the OpenSearch Ingestion Service pipeline to create. Pipeline names are unique across the pipelines owned by an account within an AWS Region.

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

VpcEndpoints.description: The VPC interface endpoints that have access to the pipeline.

VpcEndpointService.description: The VPC endpoint service name for the pipeline.

PipelineArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the pipeline.

IngestEndpointUrls.description: A list of endpoints that can be used for ingesting data into a pipeline
